alert.note: Alert for Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 04 at 3:26AM MST until March 05 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting 30 to 40 MPH. * WHERE...The southern Wood River Valley and foothills, including but not limited to Picabo, Bellevue, and Hailey. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult with slick roads, low visibility, and blowing and drifting snow across highways.
info.instruction: If you must travel across the warning area, slow down, use extra caution, and plan extra time to reach your destination. Keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest highway conditions are available at 511.idaho.gov, the Idaho 511 App, or by calling 511.
